intro: Euphrasia rigidifolia, commonly known as the rigid upright eyebright, is a herbaceous plant native to parts of Europe and Asia. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its upright growth habit and small, yellowish flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, grassy areas and has hairy stems and lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers bloom in early summer and are often visited by pollinators such as bees and butterflies. Euphrasia rigidifolia is known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
